titles.title: To extend and modify the suspension of duty on polyisobutylene.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 2/13/2008--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to provide for the reduction of the existing duty on 1-Propene-2-methyl homopolymer (Polyisobutylene).
